mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT recycle_bin.*, vm_cloud_server.instance_name AS resource_name, vm_cloud_server.instance_status AS resource_status, vm_cloud_server.instance_type_description AS resource_config, vm_cloud_server.ip_array, vm_cloud_server.create_time as resource_create_time, '--' AS relate_resource, '--' AS delete_with_instance, vm_cloud_server.account_id, cloud_account.`name` AS account_name, cloud_account.platform, USER._name AS user_name, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM recycle_bin INNER JOIN vm_cloud_server ON recycle_bin.resource_type = 'VM' AND recycle_bin.resource_id = vm_cloud_server.id AND vm_cloud_server.instance_status != 'Deleted' LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN `user` ON recycle_bin.user_id = USER.id WHERE recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' UNION ALL SELECT recycle_bin.*, vm_cloud_disk.disk_name AS resource_name, vm_cloud_disk.`status` AS resource_status, CONCAT( vm_cloud_disk.size, 'GB' ) AS resource_config, '--' AS ip_array, vm_cloud_disk.create_time as resource_create_time, IF( vm_cloud_disk.STATUS = "Available", '--',vm_cloud_server.instance_name ) AS relate_resource, vm_cloud_disk.delete_with_instance AS delete_with_instance, vm_cloud_disk.account_id, cloud_account.`name` AS account_name, cloud_account.platform, USER._name AS user_name, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name FROM recycle_bin INNER JOIN vm_cloud_disk ON recycle_bin.resource_type = 'DISK' AND recycle_bin.resource_id = vm_cloud_disk.id AND vm_cloud_disk.STATUS != 'Deleted' LEFT JOIN vm_cloud_server ON vm_cloud_server.instance_uuid = vm_cloud_disk.instance_uuid AND vm_cloud_disk.account_id = vm_cloud_server.account_id LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_disk.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_disk.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN `user` ON recycle_bin.user_id = USER.id WHERE recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' ) recycleInfo ${ew.customSqlSegment}
